data.message: Someone knows my security question and can hack me please facebook change my security question Please :(

replies.message: Hey Don. Sorry to hear about this! If you're account has been hacked, you should secure it through our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/XE9kwK  - Elissa
but if someone knows my security question ans ._. then he can hack me for sure ?

I use one word the same word for all questions. Doesn't matter if it fits the question or not. Seems to work great for me when I was hacked. No issues since. Easy to remember n only one word, ie; maybe a fav destination or place you'd like to visit one day.
so now what :\ fb should make something to change the security quest
Get the code generator, it will help a lot

Secure your page change your security questions on any thing you have. You been hacked the longer you wait the bigger the chance you have some one cause you real problems like bank account cleaned out. Purchase stuff under your mane.
If you have the messenger app you have a even worse chance people can find out where you live!! Uninstall This horrible app!
